title: RESOLVED - Connection Issues - 2:45 PM - 23rd Nov
body:
UPDATE 6:00 PM - The issue appears to be resolved. Ranked has been re-enabled.

UPDATE 4:30 PM - We're seeing packet loss occurring on parts of the internet that are adversely affecting player's connections to the League servers.  We're looking at ways to get around this, but for the moment we're keeping Ranked offline while we continue the investigation.


UPDATE 3:30 PM - We've identified the issue and are seeing improvements to player connections after initial resolution attempts.



ORIGINAL POST:

Hi everyone,

There appear to be major connection issues ongoing right now making it impossible to login and kicking players out of the client. Issue appears to be worldwide. We'll keep you updated on the progress of the issue.

replies.body: League client wont launch for me
When is ranked going to be back up?
Ranked cant be up until the game is running, right now no one i know can even connect to the game, so you cant exactly play a game with no players online

We're still seeing some ill effects of the connection issues at the moment for some players, so we're being cautious and leaving ranked down for the moment.

Once we're confident that it is fully resolved, we'll look to turn it back on.

Cheers
Mindstar
some effects lol, me and all my friends cant even get logged in
I cant even get to the logon screen. It just tells me there is an error and I need to restart or shut down my client. Im sure it will be resolved pretty quickly. it will get fixed.....Eventually
it did a mini update and now i cant open it
